sentences: Kari Marie Aarvold Glaser (born 4 January 1901 â€“ deceased 3 October 1972) was a Norwegian pianist and music teacher, married to the violinist Ernst Glaser, and the mother of pianist Liv Glaser.
Aarvold Glaser was born in Kristiania, where she made her concert debut in 1921, and became known as a performing pianist and piano teacher.
During her career, she held numerous concerts, both in Norway and abroad.
